name: Date A Fidget Spinner 2
description:
Starting right where the last game ends, on board the Fidg-Ti-Tanic, when disaster strikes.

Everything is SPINNING out of control!

As the ship sinks beneath the waves, what can you do to keep the love between a man and a fidget spinner alive?....

DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!! DATE A FIDGET SPINNER!!!

Featuring a special musical appearance by the legendary Fid-G SpinnZ.
